body_html:
I can reproduce this as well, with x = torch.rand(3,5)

Honestly I didn't even think about the AMD connection until I read the other bug reports. But that's probably it.

body_text:
I can reproduce this as well, with x = torch.rand(3,5)
Honestly I didn't even think about the AMD connection until I read the other bug reports. But that's probably it.

body:
I can reproduce this as well, with `x = torch.rand(3,5)`

Honestly I didn't even think about the AMD connection until I read the other bug reports. But that's probably it.

```Program received signal SIGILL, Illegal instruction.
0x00007f4493a3a682 in THRandom_nextState () from /home/chris/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f4493a3a682 in THRandom_nextState () from /home/chris/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1

   from /home/chris/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/_C.so

#8  PyEval_EvalFrameEx (f=<optimized out>, throwflag=<optimized out>) at Python/ceval.c:2987
#9  0x00007f449b69c1ce in PyEval_EvalCodeEx (co=0x7f449ba89230, globals=<optimized out>, locals=<optimized out>, args=<optimized out>, argcount=0, kws=0x0,
    kwcount=0, defs=0x0, defcount=0, closure=0x0) at Python/ceval.c:3582

    mod=0x1f84a88) at Python/pythonrun.c:1376

#13 0x00007f449b6bc7ee in PyRun_InteractiveLoopFlags (fp=0x7f449ac6b8e0 <_IO_2_1_stdin_>, filename=0x7f449b707c2f "<stdin>", flags=0x7ffee9209330)
    at Python/pythonrun.c:777
#14 0x00007f449b6bcf2c in PyRun_AnyFileExFlags (fp=0x7f449ac6b8e0 <_IO_2_1_stdin_>, filename=0x7f449b707c2f "<stdin>", closeit=0, flags=0x7ffee9209330)

#16 0x00007f449a8c8830 in __libc_start_main (main=0x400710 <main>, argc=1, argv=0x7ffee9209458, init=<optimized out>, fini=<optimized out>,
    rtld_fini=<optimized out>, stack_end=0x7ffee9209448) at ../csu/libc-start.c:291
```
